channel.title: Owning a boss on crystalshire
channel.description:
Just kicking a bosses ass named molten lady on a game called crystalshire
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AE_3iT1AcHI&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]

item.title: Owning a boss on crystalshire
item.dc:creator: @johnl17 johnl17
item.description:
@johnl17 wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:27, topic:430280”][quote author=johnl17 link=topic=532959.msg3895737#msg3895737 date=1327275510]

Do you mind explaining what this game is? I bet most of the users on this forum don’t have a clue, which includes me.

Its a 2d game, requires a bit more ‘skill’ than runescape. Isnt a very well known game yet, still in beta dev. and the community is based around a group of programmers and testers. And some normal people who somehow stumbled upon it. And yes, that wasnt exactly easy to do, comparable to nex on runescape.
[/quote]
More “skill” then RuneScape.

Mean while in RuneScape

-Click knife, click log-
-Level up!-

Saying it needs more skill then RuneScape is like saying something is worth more then nothing. There is no skill needed for RuneScape, just time.[/quote]
I didn’t mean runescape requires no skill, but it takes a little bit more to use directional keys, and attack keys,and a hotbar, whilst constantly using ctrl to attack, if ya know what i mean…

Read full topic

Do you mind explaining what this game is? I bet most of the users on this forum don’t have a clue, which includes me.
[/quote]
Its a 2d game, requires a bit more ‘skill’ than runescape. Isnt a very well known game yet, still in beta dev. and the community is based around a group of programmers and testers. And some normal people who somehow stumbled upon it. And yes, that wasnt exactly easy to do, comparable to nex on runescape.[/quote]
More “skill” then RuneScape.

Mean while in RuneScape

-Click knife, click log-
-Level up!-

Saying it needs more skill then RuneScape is like saying something is worth more then nothing. There is no skill needed for RuneScape, just time.

item.title: Owning a boss on crystalshire
item.dc:creator: @johnl17 johnl17
item.description:
@johnl17 wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:23, topic:430280”][quote author=chillwitm888 link=topic=532959.msg3897373#msg3897373 date=1327435345]

What is this game? I really like 2D games and this looks kind of interesting, not sure though, because it kind of looks like it was made with one of those cheesy RPG makers.

Rofl. It does, doesn’t it?
http://www.crystalshire.com/ (thats the gamesite)
It reminds me of endless online for some reason
[/quote]

Oh my god, it actually has a playerbase.[/quote]

Yes omfg, cuz it was made by a dev. who knows what he is doing shock and the best part is! Noone advertises it yet, its all based on word of mouth to friends till beta is done!!! WOW.
Seriously, Robin Perris is the real deal, ever heard of Eclipse Origins? He was a programmer behind that.

Read full topic

item.title: Owning a boss on crystalshire
item.dc:creator: @johnl17 johnl17
item.description:
@johnl17 wrote:

I wasnt really trying to promote it, as the owner of the game Robin Perris has told us not to advertise it, i was simply posting the video on a couple of the forums i am active on for fun. I didnt expect this much hate, and as with the rpg vx tilesets, they are being redone. He has used them to fill in until the official ones are finished. And you are retarded for comparing the to FF lol.

Read full topic
